item.title: Creating a FinTech AI Agent From Scratch
item.description: AI agents are popping up everywhere, and they’re only going to become more common in the next few years. Think of them as a bunch of little digital assistants—agents—that keep an eye on things, make decisions, and get stuff done. It makes me wonder: how are we going to manage all these agents down the road? How do we trust them to handle decisions for us and let them run on their own?
